sentences.en: ...Arthur Conan Doyle's classic detective novel.
sentences.cn: …阿瑟·柯南·道尔的经典侦探小说。

sentences.en: "Once a detective, always a detective," he said lightly.
sentences.cn: “一日为侦探，终生为侦探，”他满不在意地说。

sentences.en: a detective story/novel
sentences.cn: 侦探故事 / 小说

sentences.en: a pastiche of the classic detective story
sentences.cn: 经典侦探故事的仿作

sentences.en: detectives from the anti-terrorist squad
sentences.cn: 反恐怖主义小组的侦探

sentences.en: He buried himself in his detective story again.
sentences.cn: 他又沉浸在他的侦探故事里了。

sentences.en: I don't have to be a detective to figure that out.
sentences.cn: 我不是侦探也想得出。

sentences.en: I'mno great shakes as a detective.
sentences.cn: 作为一名侦探我并不出色。

sentences.en: It's the detective-sergeant. He wants a word.
sentences.cn: 这位是探长，他想找你聊两句。

sentences.en: Joan Smith's detective stories are a cut above the rest.
sentences.cn: 琼·史密斯的侦探小说比其他侦探小说都要出色。

sentences.en: Journalists informed police who planted an undercover detective to trap Smith.
sentences.cn: 记者通知了警方，后者于是为诱捕史密斯而安插了一名卧底侦探。

sentences.en: Now detectives are appealing for witnesses who may have seen anything suspicious last night.
sentences.cn: 现在侦探们正在呼吁昨晚可能看到任何可疑情况的人出来作证。

sentences.en: She hired a detective to find out if her husband was having an affair.
sentences.cn: 她雇了一个私人侦探调查她丈夫是否有外遇。

sentences.en: The detective discovered no fewer than 35 fingerprints.
sentences.cn: 那位侦探发现了至少35个指纹。

sentences.en: The detective gives a false colour to this whole business.
sentences.cn: 这个侦探彻底地歪曲了整个事件.

sentences.en: The detective tried to pin the murder on the accused man.
sentences.cn: 那侦探企图把杀人的罪名加在那个被告的身上.

sentences.en: The detective was trying to winkle information out of her.
sentences.cn: 侦探试图从她那儿套取信息。

sentences.en: The detective-constable picked out the words with difficulty.
sentences.cn: 探警费力地辨认出这些文字。

sentences.en: The store detective told the shoplifter that the game was up.
sentences.cn: 该商店侦探告诉冒充顾客进商店行窃的扒手,他已被发现了.

sentences.en: The woman detective shifted her stance from one foot to another.
sentences.cn: 女侦探改变了站姿，把重心从一只脚移到另一只脚。

words.tran_cn: 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉

trans.tran_en: A detective novel or story is one in which a detective tries to solve a crime
a police officer whose job is to discover information about crimes and catch criminals
